name: Belly Dance Workshop "Bundle"
description:
1 Full day 4x Belly Dance Workshops - Stick,Tribal floorwork, Pops Locks N Robots And Tahitian Belly Dance Fusion

London
EC1V 2PY
Closest tube: Angel (Northern line)

name: Belly Dance "Stick" Workshop
description:
1.00-2.30 pm
STICK DANCE..........Get fun and traditional with Stick dancing. Learn the techiques of manipulting the stick and useing it to give your dancing a real earthy and beduin style. This will be incorporated with bellydance moves you'll already know and is a great way to spice up the variety of a showcase. We will be building up to a fun choreography which will leave you wanting to invest in your very own stick. Level 2+ (sticks Povided)
  
VENUE:
Fitness First Islington
361-373 City Road
London
EC1V 2PY
Closest tube: Angel (Northern line)

name: Belly Dance "Tribal floorwork"
description:
2.30-4.00pm
TRIBAL FLOORWORK 
Learn floorwork TRIBAL style with a focus on key moves, transitions and Tribal combinations.
Level 2 

VENUE:
Fitness First Islington
361-373 City Road
London
EC1V 2PY
Closest tube: Angel (Northern line)

name: Belly Dance "Pops Locks N robots"
description:
4.30-6.00PM 
POPS/ LOCKS AND ROBOTS.....learn how to break down the clever technique to popping and locking, establishing the difference's between them and learning how to incorporate it into bellydance. Learn how to isolate unusual places like elbows and shoulders and by doing this creating illusions such as sinking, growing, sliding and being pushed! This will build up to a choreography which can be used for either bellydance hiphop or tribal. For levels 2+

VENUE:
Fitness First Islington
361-373 City Road
London
EC1V 2PY
Closest tube: Angel (Northern line)

name: Belly Dance "Tahitian Fusion"
description:
TAHITIAN BELLY DANCE FUSION
This workshop will fuse elements of Tahitian dance with Belly dance. Tahitian movements compliment belly dance technique beautifully!
Be prepared to SWEAT and do some serious hip rolling!!!!
Ballet pumps, socks or padding on balls of the feet recomended!
GENERAL LEVEL

VENUE:
Fitness First Islington
361-373 City Road
London
EC1V 2PY
Closest tube: Angel (Northern line)
